prompts: Create a powerful fire-type Pokemon that resembles a roaring beast with glowing patterns.
I want a muscular Pokemon with bright orange fur and a fierce expression, ready for battle.
Generate an intense fire-themed character that has a mix of red and black colors.

Imagine a Pokemon with a fiery mane and a tough, armored body, standing in a forest.
Design a unique fire-type Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience with a fierce stance.
Give me an iconic fire Pokemon that has a blend of aggression and playful charm.
